relation: Can't be that bad. We've got the LAPD Harbor Area Sheriffs on our campus....
Haven't experienced the food, but it looks good. But the lady who works the register during lunch is terrific
It would be really less complicated if you know what you are majoring in versus being undecided.
I really like Harbor College and the Faculty and Staff that has tremendously helped me so far in getting through my fourth week, being a first year student.
pageTitle: Los Angeles Harbor College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: 07/07/2011 Reviewer is A past student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 2 of 36 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Determined students. Students who are first in their family to graduate from any school. Single parents or parents trying to go back to school. Students straight out of highschool who still haven't figured out what they want to do. Tips for prospective students I recommend joining a club or organization to get involved in the campus. It's a small school so not many people get involved, but when they do it's always fun. I also recommend applying for financial aid as soon as possible and sign up for classes as soon as you're able to. Even though it's a community college, graduating from there is quite heart felt. It's close to home and everyone is kind of in the same boat as you are. Bang for the buck Bookstore books are always overpriced! Online prices like Amazon.com or eBay or Chegg are way more inexpensive! However, the prices per unit aren't that bad, and the library only charges .10
